definition: tight/strict/close at hand/near/urgent/tense/hard up/short of money/to tighten
surname Mi/name of an ancient state
to coordinate closely/to act in close partnership with

sentences.english: They are two immediately contiguous areas.
sentences.chinese: 他们是紧密接邻的地区。

sentences.english: Virtuality and social media are closely tied.
sentences.chinese: 虚拟世界和社会化媒体关系紧密。

sentences.english: The cristae of the mitochondria are arranged closely.
sentences.chinese: 线粒体内嵴排列紧密，呈板层状。

sentences.english: Fabrics with a close weave are ideal for painting.
sentences.chinese: 编织紧密的布最适合作画。

sentences.english: Second, the contents of press superintend hold tightly with modern living.
sentences.chinese: 新闻舆论监督的内容与现代生活紧密相关。

sentences.english: I was touched by the culture belt between China and Japan.
sentences.chinese: 中日的文化有着如此紧密的联系使我感动不已。

sentences.english: Shen Yinmo is closely related to the revival of modern Chinese calligraphic culture.
sentences.chinese: 沈尹默与现代中国书法文化复兴是紧密相联的。

sentences.english: Lips are thin and tight, black to dark brown in color.
sentences.chinese: 嘴唇薄而紧密，颜色为黑色或深褐色。

sentences.english: The final process in ring spinning of single yarn is the spinning operation.
sentences.chinese: 比较了紧密纺和环锭纺纱线的试验结果。

sentences.english: The U.S.-Australian relationship is as close as any.
sentences.chinese: 美澳关系一直十分紧密。

sentences.english: The two countries are becoming increasingly interdependent and are closely connected with each other in their future development.
sentences.chinese: 俄中相互依存日益紧密，发展前途密切相关。

sentences.english: That is because they are often closely interwoven.
sentences.chinese: 那是因为他们常常紧密地交织在一起。

sentences.english: This kind of attack has a close contact with the problem of women liberations.
sentences.chinese: 这种抨击是与妇女解放问题紧密联系在一起的。

sentences.english: People aroud the globe are more connected to each other than ever before.
sentences.chinese: 世界人民的联系比以往更加紧密。

sentences.english: Membrane structures of partial tight junction and the joints of cytoplasm process with intercells were found.
sentences.chinese: 细胞间存在胞膜局部紧密连接和胞质突起接合。

sentences.english: Tree worship and serpent worship are also closely related.
sentences.chinese: 当然树崇拜与蛇崇拜也是紧密相连的。

definition: close/familiar/intimate/closely (related)/to foster close ties/to pay close attention
to link/to join/to attach/connection/a link (on web page)
to fit tightly (idiom)/to join seamlessly/to fit snugly
